input.sentences: the schoolchildren were going to make flower bouquets for the residents at the nursing home .
but they needed to do it `` hands on '' before they understood what they were supposed to do .
everyone was very happy with the results and proud of their work .
they were sad to have to give them away | so everyone posed for a picture to remember their work and their good deed .
output.sentences: The residents were worried their new nurses were too young as they were still schoolchildren.
The male incharge gave the children detailed instructions to become decent nurses.
The children supposed they understood, but didn't wash their hands first.
Initially, the results were positive and the children were happy with their work.
Unfortunately, not washing their hands posed a serious risk to their next few patients, resulting in sad deaths the kids would prefer to not remember.
